text:
Ikarus | Fall/Spring/Summer Interns | On-Site Gurgaon India | ikarus.ai

We are a funded B2B startup working on an AI framework which can be used to automate manual repetitive processes based on unstructured text data.

Our web stack is Django/React and we use Spark to train and deploy our Machine Learning/Deep Learning algorithms. Based on your experience and interest, you will work either on our web stack or ML component.

Please send your resumes to rishi@ikarus.ai
